com.alvarpq.GOTF.coreGame.units

Class Ability

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alvarpq.GOTF.coreGame.units.Ability

  • public abstract class Ability
extends java.lang.Object
    The superclass of all abilities returned by getAbility in AbilityBearer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The element cost of the ability.

      The name of the ability.

      The owner of the ability.
      private Requirement[] requirements
      The requirements needed to be fulfilled before activating the ability.

      The resource cost of the ability.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ability

        public Ability(java.lang.String name,
               int resourceCost,
               java.util.List<Element> elementCost)
        Instantiates a new ability.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the ability
        resourceCost - the cost in resources to activate the ability
        elementCost - the cost in elements to activate the ability

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the ability's requirements. This function has to be called at the end of triggerAbility (if triggerAbility returns true) in all abilities.

      • triggerAbility

        public abstract boolean triggerAbility(Side mySide,
                                       Side opponentsSide)
        This function is called by the game when the ability is triggered. Always make sure the ability is ready in triggerAbility.
        Parameters:
        mySide - theSide this ability belongs to
        opponentsSide - the opponent to the side this ability belongs to
        Returns:
        whether the ability was triggered

      • isReady

        public boolean isReady()
        Returns whether this ability is ready to be triggered.
        Returns:
        whether this ability is ready to be triggered
